messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
How will the Keeper decide what happens to Harvey if he fails his Jump roll?
The Keeper could describe Harvey falling to his death, ending the game, or describe how he falls and lands in an underground river.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the two possible outcomes for Harvey if he fails his Jump roll?
The first outcome will end the game, and the second allows the game to continue.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the Keeper describes Harvey falling to his death?
The game will end for Harvey's player.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the Keeper describes Harvey landing in an underground river?
The game can continue, but Harvey's equipment is lost.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the recommended outcome when the game is about to end?
The first outcome will bring the game to a sudden end.
You are a helpful assistant.
What should the Keeper decide when multiple characters need to work together?
The decision of how many investigators may be involved in a particular situation is up to the Keeper.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are some alternative options to sudden death in the game?
More Than One Player Rolling Dice for a Skill Roll
You are a helpful assistant.
Can two or more characters work together to achieve a goal?
Yes, in some circumstances two or more characters may work together towards the same goal
You are a helpful assistant.
How many people can assist each other in carrying a body?
Up to four people.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can investigators in a public library conduct research and attempt a skill roll?
Yes, all investigators in the library.
You are a helpful assistant.
What should the Keeper use to set the difficulty level for carrying a body?
The SIZ characteristic of the body
You are a helpful assistant.
How many successful rolls are required to conduct research in a public library?
One successful roll
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required for a successful roll in Spotting a clue?
One successful roll is required.
You are a helpful assistant.
What skill must everyone roll when trying to sneak past a guard?
Stealth skill.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if one person fails a Stealth roll?
The guard will be alerted to their presence.
You are a helpful assistant.
How many investigators can administer First Aid to a fallen comrade?
Two investigators can administer First Aid to a fallen comrade.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required when an investigator attempts the same goal a second time?
a pushed roll
You are a helpful assistant.
How many investigators can administer First Aid to a fallen comrade?
two
